attributes.additional_details: I really do urge you not to ban the breed. As a nation we cannot express to you enough how ITS NOT THE DOG ITS THE OWNER! The nation has a whole army behind the breed to back them, with proof! You are not only destroying the breed you are destroying families.
attributes.background: DO NOT BAN THE XL BULLY BREED. You have the breed all wrong and as a nation we cannot stress that enough. DO NOT DESTROY FAMILIES BECAUSE YOU ARE UNEDUCATED ON DOG TRAINING.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Remove breed specific legislation. Consider alternative methods for dog control: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638509
